wikipedia_page.main: Sir Joseph McConnell, 2nd Baronet (17 September 1877 – 27 August 1942), was an  Ulster Unionist politician. He was Member of Parliament (MP) for Antrim from 1929 to 1942.

response: *Sir Joseph McConnell, 2nd Baronet (1877–1942), Member of Parliament (MP) for Antrim, 1929–1942
He was also a Deputy Lieutenant for Belfast and was appointed High Sheriff of Antrim in 1942.  He married Josephine McConnell, daughter of Sir Joseph McConnell, 2nd Baronet, and had three children.
